text: Phantom Planet is an American rock band from Los Angeles. They were formed in 1994. They consist of Alex Greenwald, Darren Robinson, Sam Farrar and Jeff Conrad. They are best known for its track "California", which became the theme song for the TV series The O.C.. The band featured actor Jason Schwartzman on drums until 2003. title: Phantom Planet
